about-page.des-1: This app allows patients and their families to complete the online appointment registration process with hospitals anytime, anywhere, without the need to visit the hospital in person.

home.connecting: Connecting people with Healthcare Facilities - Services
home.quick-oline-remote: Quick appointment booking - Online queue number - Remote health consultation
home.des-2: provides online medical examination and healthcare appointment booking services at leading hospitals in Vietnam such as Ho Chi Minh City University of Medicine and Pharmacy Hospital, Cho Ray Hospital and Children's Hospital, helping users choose services and doctors according to their needs.
home.des-3: Make an appointment with more than
home.quick appointment-get online queue numbe: Quick appointment - Get online queue number
home.des-5: Patients proactively select quick appointment information (date, time and medical facility). Patients will receive an online queue number right on the software.

medpro.get a quick online check-up number: Get a quick online check-up number
medpro.des-6: Register for quick examination / re-examination by date.
medpro.des-9: Telehealth consultation, video calls with medical professionals
medpro.des-10: Look up clinical test results online easily and conveniently
medpro.des-12: Professional home health care services (nursing, testing) to meet common home health care needs
medpro.des-13: Network connecting with hospitals, clinics, and practices nationwide
medpro.des-16: Patients actively choose appointment information (date and time of appointment)
medpro.des-18: Patients will receive online examination vouchers right on the software.
medpro.des-19: Extending reach to bridge every distance
medpro.des-20: Users select and make payments on the software
